title: Recurrence
text: Let F0 = 1. Fn = a*Fn-1 + b for n >= 1. Find Fn (mod M).InputThe first line contains T the number of test cases. Each of the next T lines contains 4 space separated integers a, b, n and M.ConstraintsT <= 200000 <= a, b, n <=Â  10^1001 <= M <= 100000OutputOutput T lines, one corresponding to each test case.ExampleInput:31 1 1 102 1 2 55 2 20 30Output:227
